/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -lXxf86vm -lXext -lX11 -lGL -lGLU   CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/srcs/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/srcs/Game/Map/Map.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/srcs/Game/Display/Display.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/srcs/Game/Characters/ACharacter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/srcs/Game/Characters/Player.cpp.o CMakeFiles/bomberman.dir/srcs/Core/Bomberman.cpp.o  -o bin/bomberman -lIrrlicht
